title: 2 Open Source AI Tools That Reduce DevOps Friction
author: Eran Bibi
description: AI as Code (AIaC) and K8sGPT are toil-reducing command-line tools that automate tasks like generating IaC code and troubleshooting Kubernetes.
cntitle: 两个开源 AI 工具，减少 DevOps 摩擦
cndescription: AI 作为代码 (AIaC) 和 K8sGPT 是减少工作量的命令行工具，可自动执行生成 IaC 代码和排查 Kubernetes 故障等任务。
